title: Members whose services are on loan to other governments
context: ยง88-60 Members whose services are on loan to other governments. Any member whose services are on loan to another government, as authorized by section 78-27, shall retain the member&rsquo;s membership and shall receive credit in the system for such service; provided that the member returns to the member&rsquo;s former employment within ninety days after the termination of such service; and provided further that the government receiving the loan of the member&rsquo;s services fulfills all of the requirements of section 78-27. [L 1969, c 110, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985; am L 2002, c 148, ยง5]
